name: Crock Pot Roast
ingredients:
• 1 Beef Roast
  • 1 Package Brown Gravy Mix
  • 1 Package Dried Italian Salad Dressing Mix
  • 1 Package Dry ranch Dressing Mix
  • 1/2 Water
steps:
1. Place beef roast in crock pot.
  2. Mix the dried mixes together in a bowl and sprinkle over the roast.
  3. Pour the water around the roast.
  4. Cook on low for 7-9 hours.

name: Roasted Asparagus
ingredients:
• 1 lb Asparagus
  • 1 1/2 tbsp Olive Oil
  • 1/2 tsp Kosher Salt
steps:
1. Preheat oven to 425Â°F.
  2. Cut off the woody bottom part of the asparagus spears and discard.
  3. With a vegetable peeler, peel off the skin on the bottom 2-3 inches of the spears (this keeps the asparagus from being all, and if you eat asparagus you know what I mean by that).
  4. Place asparagus on foil-lined baking sheet and drizzle with olive oil.
  5. Sprinkle with salt.
  6. With your hands, roll the asparagus around until they are evenly coated with oil and salt.
  7. Roast for 10-15 minutes, depending on the thickness of your stalks and how tender you like them.
  8. They should be tender when pierced with the tip of a knife.
  9. The tips of the spears will get very brown but watch them to prevent burning.
  10. They are great plain, but sometimes I serve them with a light vinaigrette if we need something acidic to balance out our meal.

name: Curried Lentils and Rice
ingredients:
• 1 quart Beef Broth
  • 1 Cup Dried Green Lentis
  • 1/2 cup Basmati Rice
  • 1 tsp Curry Powder
  • 1 tsp Salt
steps:
1. Bring broth to a low boil.
  2. Add curry powder and salt.
  3. Cook lentils for 20 minutes.
  4. Add rice and simmer for 20 minutes.
  5. Enjoy!

name: Big Night Pizza
ingredients:
• 5 tsp Yeast
  • 5 cups Flour
  • 4 tbsp Vegetable Oil
  • 2 tbsp sugar
  • 2 tsp Salt
  • 2 cups Hot Water
  • 1/4 Cup Pizza Sauce
  • 3/4 cup Mozzarella Cheese
steps:
1. Add hot water to yeast in a large bowl and let sit for 15 minutes.
  2. Mix in oil, sugar, salt, and flour and let sit for 1 hour.
  3. Knead the dough and spread onto a pan.
  4. Spread pizza sauce and sprinkle cheese.
  5. Add any optional toppings as you wish.
  6. Bake at 400 deg Fahrenheit for 15 minutes.
  7. Enjoy!

name: Cranberry and Apple Stuffed Acorn Squash Recipe
ingredients:
• 2 Acorn Squash
  • 1 Boiling Water
  • 2 Apples chopped into 1.4 inch pieces
  • 1/2 cup Dried Cranberries
  • 1 tsp Cinnamon
  • 2 tbsp Melted Butter
steps:
1. Cut squash in half, remove seeds.
  2. Place squash in baking dish, cut-side down.
  3. Pour 1/4-inch water into dish.
  4. Bake for 30 minutes at 350 degrees F.
  5. In large bowl, combine remaining ingredients.
  6. Remove squash from oven, fill with mix.
  7. Bake for 30-40 more minutes, until squash tender.
  8. Enjoy!

name: Mic's Yorkshire Puds
ingredients:
• 200g Plain Flour
  • 3 Eggs
  • 300ml Milk
  • 3 tbsp Vegetable Oil
steps:
1. Put the flour and some seasoning into a large bowl.
  2. Stir in eggs, one at a time.
  3. Whisk in milk until you have a smooth batter.
  4. Chill in the fridge for at least 30 minutes.
  5. Heat oven to 220C/gas mark 7.
  6. Pour the oil into the holes of a 8-hole muffin tin.
  7. Heat tin in the oven for 5 minutes.
  8. Ladle the batter mix into the tin.
  9. Bake for 30 minutes until well browned and risen.
